baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cash transfers increase household consumption (time-demeaned) in the GiveDirectly Kenya RCT.
baseline_groups.notes: Primary consumption outcome. Coefficient ~286 PPP USD, p<0.001.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cash transfers increase household assets (time-demeaned) in the GiveDirectly Kenya RCT.
baseline_groups.notes: Primary assets outcome. Coefficient ~189 PPP USD, p<1e-11.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cash transfers increase household income (time-demeaned) in the GiveDirectly Kenya RCT.
baseline_groups.notes: Primary income outcome. Coefficient ~75 PPP USD, p=0.086. Weakest baseline.

global_notes: Three baseline outcomes. Most robustness specs focus on G1 (consumption). Heterogeneity interaction specs report main coefficient for omitted subgroup.
